original_text: Jesus' disciples did not understand all this at that time. They understood only after Jesus had returned to God in heaven. Then they remembered that someone had written these things about him in the Bible. And they remembered that these things had now really happened to him.
korean_text: 제자들은 처음에 이 일을 깨닫지 못하였다가 예수께서 영광을 얻으신 후에야 이것이 예수께 대하여 기록된 것임과 사람들이 예수께 이같이 한 것임이 생각났더라

sentences.original_text: Jesus' disciples did not understand all this
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님의 제자들은 이 모든 것을 이해하지 못했다

sentences.original_text: They understood only after Jesus had returned
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수님께서 돌아가신 후에야 비로소 이해했다

sentences.original_text: that someone had written these things about him
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람이 그에 대해 이런 것들을 썼다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that these things had now really happened
sentences.korean_translation: 이런 것들이 이제 정말 일어났다는 것을
